title: An Act regulating fees for the registration of attorneys

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Linsky of Natick, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 1844) of David Paul Linsky that the Board of Bar Overseers be prohibited from assessing an annual registration fee for attorneys who retire from the practice of law.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
Hearing scheduled for 11/04/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-1
